ca.hullabaloo.util.sax
Class DocumentSplitterFilter

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.XMLFilterImpl
      ca.hullabaloo.util.sax.DocumentSplitterFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler, org.xml.sax.XMLFilter, org.xml.sax.XMLReader
public class DocumentSplitterFilter
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.XMLFilterImpl

Splits a document to different content handlers. Each time a new element is selected by the SaxElementSelector the element is sent to a new content handler.

Constructor Summary
